curam.omega3.user
Class UserPreferences

java.lang.Object
  curam.omega3.user.InfrastructureUserPreferences
      curam.omega3.user.UserPreferences
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class UserPreferences
extends curam.omega3.user.InfrastructureUserPreferences

General container for all user preferences stored at session scope in the web application. The build-in preferences (those specifically supported by the infrastructure) should never return null values: an appropriate default value will be created when the getter is called if no value is already present.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getTabListing

public curam.omega3.user.OpenTabList getTabListing()
Return the tab listing information. If it is not previously created or has been created but the user has changed, then it will be initialized using the configuration information from the application configuration.

Returns:
The tab listing information.
